channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Webriti SMTP Mail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Webriti SMTP Mail

item.title: CVE-2022-1612|2024-08-03T00:10:03.626Z -- unknown -- webriti%20smtp%20mail
item.description: The Webriti SMTP Mail WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
